articles.title: Kim Yong Il Meets Turkish Party Delegation
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il Meets Turkish Party Delegation
 Pyongyang,  September 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea Central Committee, Monday met and had a talk with a delegation of the Workers' Party of Turkey headed by Dasar Karadag, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee, who paid a courtesy call on him.

articles.title: CPRK Warns S. Korea's Provocations against Fishing Boats
articles.content:
CPRK Warns S. Korea's Provocations against Fishing Boats
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued the following statement on Sunday:
					 As already reported, the south Korean puppet forces have become frantic with DPRK-targeted war exercises on the five islands in the West Sea of Korea and in the waters around them, escalating the military tension to extremes. 
					
					 On Friday, they perpetrated such a grave military provocation as letting warships of the navy intrude deep into the territorial waters of the north southwest of Yonphyong Island and firing at random bullets and shells at civilian fishing boats engaged in normal fishing operations.
					
					 Timed to coincide with this, they kicked off such racket as letting fighters equipped with missiles make emergency sorties and massively beefed up their naval forces in those waters before putting them on emergency alert.
					
					 The fishing boats they targeted were civilian boats of other country.
					
					Firing at peaceful fishing boats is an unpardonable and illegal action against humanity.
					
					 They committed such provocation though they were well aware that they were peaceful fishing boats. This clearly indicates they are ferocious brutes and man-killers. 
					
					 That is why south Korean people of different strata are becoming vocal condemning them, bitterly angered by their military provocations and brutal acts while domestic and foreign public is expressing deep concern over them.
					
					 It is needless to say that the puppet forces orchestrated lots of military provocations in the area along the Military Demarcation Line and the East and West Seas of Korea in the same way as they did this time.
					
					 The reckless military provocations perpetrated by them in the waters along the maritime military demarcation line in the West Sea of Korea, the biggest flashpoint, cannot be construed otherwise than a deliberate and premeditated scenario to provoke a war at any cost and thus seek a way out of the abyss of ruin. 
					
					 This is nothing but a last-ditch effort of the conservative group to retrieve an ignominious defeat and disgrace they suffered in the last Yonphyong shelling battle and hype the issue of "security" in a bid to deter the public opinion from turning favorable for democratic and pro-reform forces and make the situation before the "presidential" election turn favorable for its stay in power. 
					
					 The recent incident made it clearer who is the war provocateur on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The world knows no such rogues and worst maniacs as the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors who is kicking up such war hysteria, misusing even civilian fishing boats for the confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 The group's desperate efforts to ignite a war, zealously pursuant to the U.S. policy of aggression in an effort to prolong its remaining days, only indicate that it is going to its doom.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will never tolerate any provocation of the enemies but mercilessly beat it back. 
					
					 Only the most miserable end and death await the provocateurs.

articles.title: Hyon Hak Bong Presents Credentials to Grand Duke of Luxembourg
articles.content:
Hyon Hak Bong Presents Credentials to Grand Duke of Luxembourg
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Hyon Hak Bong, DPRK ambassador to Grand Duchy of Luxembourg, presented his credentials to the Grand Duke of Luxembourg on Sep. 19.
					 The Grand Duke said the world is watching with deep attention the DPRK having Marshal Kim Jong Un as its supreme leader.
					
					 The Grand Duke wished Kim Jong Un great success in his work for the country's economic construction and the people's well-being, adding:
					
					 I hope everything will go well in the DPRK.
					
					 I believe that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will grow stronger in various fields.

articles.title: WHO Director of Regional Office for South-East Asia Here
articles.content:
WHO Director of Regional Office for South-East Asia Here
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) --  Samlee Plianbangchang, director of the Regional Office for South-East Asia of the World Health Organisation, and his party arrived here Monday.

articles.title: Greetings from Indonesian President
articles.content:
Greetings from Indonesian President
Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) --  A message of greeting came to Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, from Susilo Bambang Yudhoyono, president of the Republic of Indonesia, on Sept. 21.
					The message extended most heartfelt congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the government and people of the DPRK on the occasion of the DPRK founding anniversary on behalf of the government and people of the Republic of Indonesia.
					
					   It reiterated the hope that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would further develop.
					
					   It sent most sincere respects to Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Greetings from Sierra Leonean President
articles.content:
Greetings from Sierra Leonean President
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a message of greeting from Sierra Leonean President Ernest Bai Koroma on Sept. 3.
					 Ernest Bai Koroma said in his message that it was his great pleasure to send the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un and the government and people of the DPRK on the occasion of the auspicious anniversary of the founding of the DPRK.
					
					 He wished Kim Jong Un good health and happiness, expressing the expectation that the warm ties existing between the two countries would grow stronger.
					
					 He extended the highest regards to Kim Jong Un, sincerely wishing him good health.

articles.title: Greetings from King of Spain
articles.content:
Greetings from King of Spain
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, received a message of greeting from Juan Carlos Ⅰ, king of Spain, on September 10.
					 The king in the message extended congratulations to the people of the DPRK on behalf of the government of Spain and its people and on his own behalf on the occasion of the founding anniversary of the DPRK.
					
					 He sincerely wished the people of the DPRK peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Gift from Turkish Political Party
articles.content:
Gift from Turkish Political Party
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received a gift from the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Turkey.
					 The gift was handed to Kim Yong Il, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, on Monday by Dasar Karadag, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the above-said Turkish party, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Many Gifts from Foreign Countries and Int'l Organizations
articles.content:
Many Gifts from Foreign Countries and Int'l Organizations
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received gifts from foreign party, state and government heads and people from all walks of life and personages of international and regional organizations. 
					 The president of the Council of State of Cuba who is the president of the Council of Ministers presented a gift representing the sword used by Antonio Maceo, national hero of Cuba. 
					
					 The general manager of Stroitselinaya Kompaniya Vostok Co., Ltd. in Novosibirsk City of Russia presented a sword with his best wishes. 
					
					 The manager of the Commerce and Industry and Real Estate Investment Company in Latakia Province of Syria sent a sword bearing words "The sword Your Excellency holds is power of justice, inexhaustible power of justice defending the country and all". 
					
					 The general secretary of the Central Committee of the Lao People's Revolutionary Party who is the president of the Lao People's Democratic Republic presented a gift with his sincerity during his visit to the DPRK. 
					
					 The Mongolian president sent him a woolen sweater wishing him good health. 
					
					 A vice-premier of the State Council of China who is member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the Communist Party of China presented a ceramic work to him. 
					
					 Members of a company of Chinese Hong Kong sent him a jasper which was used to make Royal seals of kings and their valuable things and ornaments of royal household. 
					
					 The managing general of Dandong China-DPRK Frontier Trade Ministry of China and the managing general of a company of Singapore presented a large gem craftwork "Wealth under Heaven". 
					
					 The U.S. non-governmental Global Resource Service sent copper craftwork "Five steeds ". They are symbolic of strength, wisdom and progress. 
					
					 The chairman of the Switzerland-Korea Committee specially prepared and sent a musical box to Kim Jong Un ardently hoping that he would have even a short rest, listening to music. 
					
					 Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong who is related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle in China, presented him with a hanging-roll carrying letters "Governing Country, Defending Security". 
					
					 The minister of Public Security of Vietnam sent a craftwork "Mark of the Minister of Public Security of Vietnam", a company of Vladivostok in Russia a crystal vase, the secretary general of the International Institute of the Juche Idea gourd craftwork "Doll".
					
					 Among those who sent gifts to him are the Ministry of the Revolutionary Armed Forces of Cuba, the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, the Central Directive Council of the Indonesian Democratic Party of Struggle, the Syrian newspaper Al Baath, the AP of the U.S., the Asian Olympic Council, Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il Fund and other foreign governments, political parties, bodies, regional and international organizations and people of different social standings. 
					
					 The director general of the Asian Regional Institute of the Juche Idea presented a crystal craftwork carrying the image of smiling Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 A member of the Italian branch of the Korean Friendship Association sent a glass craftwork "instrument for measuring intensity of light". 
					
					 All the gifts reflect the boundless reverence of all people for another prominent leader of Korea and the great sun in the era of independence.

articles.title: SPA Deputies Pay Floral Tribute
articles.content:
SPA Deputies Pay Floral Tribute
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Deputies to the 6th Session of the 12th Supreme People's Assembly Monday laid a floral basket and bunches of flowers to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces before paying homage to them.

articles.title: Chinese Delegations Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Chinese Delegations Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Chinese delegations on Monday visited the equestrian statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il at the Mansudae Art Studio and paid respects to them.
					 They included the delegation of the Chinese Academy of Sciences headed by Fang Xin, vice chief of the party organization of the academy, and the one of the Chinese State Administration of Radio, Film and Television led by Vice－Minister Li Wei.
					
					 They placed bunches of flowers before the statues of the peerlessly great men before paying tribute in deep reverence. 
					
					 Both delegations arrived here on the same day.

articles.title: Turkish Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Turkish Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Workers' Party of Turkey headed by Dasar Karadag, member of the Political Bureau of its Central Committee, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The guests looked round the historic relics preserved at the President's old home in Mangyongdae with care, being briefed on his revolutionary history.
					
					 The head of the delegation said that visit to the old home in Mangyongdae where he was born makes the reverence for him grow stronger.
					
					 Kim Il Sung devoted his all to the prosperity of the country and the happiness of the people, he said.
					
					 He said that the President will always live in the hearts of the progressive people, adding that he was the great leader of the Korean people as well as the political elder of the world revolution.
					
					 The guests toured the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong.
					
					 They laid bouquets before the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk on the occasion of the 63rd anniversary of her death and paid respects.
					
					 The delegation also visited the e-library of Kim Il Sung University, National Gifts Exhibition House, Hana Music Information Centre, etc. and enjoyed the mass gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang".

articles.title: Pyongyang Film Festival Participants Spend Pleasant Day
articles.content:
Pyongyang Film Festival Participants Spend Pleasant Day
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- There took place in Mt. Myohyang on Monday an amusement and sports event for the participants in the 13th Pyongyang International Film Festival (PIFF).
					 The participants were divided into the red group and blue one.
					
					 They competed in such games as breaking balloons, walking on bricks, etc.
					
					 When the players demonstrated their skills in high spirit, the audience zealously cheered their teams.

articles.title: Pyongyang Film Festival Participants Visit Int'l Friendship Exhibition
articles.content:
Pyongyang Film Festival Participants Visit Int'l Friendship Exhibition
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 13th Pyongyang International Film Festival Monday visited the International Friendship Exhibition.
					 In the exhibition they paid their respects to the wax statue of President Kim Il Sung who made undying contributions to global independence and the development of culture and arts of humankind.
					
					 They went round the gifts to the President, leader Kim Jong Il and the dear respected Kim Jong Un from party, state and government leaders and preeminent figures of many countries.

articles.title: Joint Scientific Conference Opens
articles.content:
Joint Scientific Conference Opens
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Joint scientific conference of Kim Il Sung University and the Eurasia-Pacific Uninet opened with due ceremony at Kim Il Sung University Monday.
					 The conference whose theme is "Biomedical and Biotechnological Progress for a Healthy Society" will be held, divided into life science panel and veterinary science panel and scores of papers will be presented to it.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were teachers and researchers of the university and prominent scholars who are members of the delegation of the Eurasia-Pacific Uninet led by Vice-Chairman Wolf-Dieter Rausch.
					
					 An opening speech and congratulatory speeches were made there.
					
					 Kim Kyun, first vice-president of Kim Il Sung University, expressed the conviction that the conference would offer an important occasion for deepening friendship and bonds between the two universities and opening a new chapter for exchange and cooperation between them.
					
					 Song Ja Rip, president of Kim Il Sung University and minister of Higher Education, said that the conference of renowned scholars is of great significance, voicing conviction that the conference would actively contribute to the promotion of well-fare and health of the people in the DPRK and various other countries.
					
					 Wolf-Dieter Rausch said that the delegation deems it an honor to organize the conference jointly with Kim Il Sung University.
					
					 Buyantogtokh Choijilsuren, doctor of the National University of Mongolia, said that it was pleasure for her to take part in the conference, wishing it bigger success.
					
					 Panel discussions were held.
					
					 The Eurasia-Pacific Uninet hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club for the participants in the conference on the same day.

articles.title: Scientific Conference Participants Pay Floral Tribute
articles.content:
Scientific Conference Participants Pay Floral Tribute
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The participants in the joint academic seminar of Kim Il Sung University and the Eurasia-Pacific UNINET placed a floral basket before the statue of President      Kim Il Sung on Mt. Ryongnam on Monday before paying tribute to him.

articles.title: Scientific Conference in Pyongyang
articles.content:
Joint Scientific Conference in Pyongyang
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- A joint scientific conference of the Eurasia-Pacific Uninet and Kim Il Sung University is going on here with a view to contributing to the improvement of people's wellbeing.
					 The theme of the conference is "Biomedical and biotechnological progress for a healthy society", and it is held divided into life sciences and veterinary medicine sections.
					
					 At the conference on Monday, Wolf-Dieter Rausch from University of Veterinary Medicine Vienna, Austria, made a speech titled "Nerve cell culture as a tool to understand neurodegenerative processes."
					
					 The first nerve culture is of high technology in studying the functions of nerve, he said, stressing that he would develop the pharmacological strategy to find out nerve-protecting medicine for the treatment of aging diseases and acquire know-how needed for replacing nerve tissue and recovering damaged parts in case of spinal disease.
					
					 Dr. Buyantogtokh Choijilsuren of National University of Mongolia, in her speech titled "Implications of disaster and environmental pollution to livestock mortality", said that the research on this theme is aimed to deal with the number of increasing domestic animals in the last decade and the history of factors affecting their death rate.
					
					 Besides, there were speeches on such subjects as "Isolation and characterization of glycolipoprotein from biomaterials" and "Immunogenicity of Rubella vaccine".
					
					 The conference goes on.

articles.title: 8th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair Opens
articles.content:
8th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair Opens
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The 8th Pyongyang Autumn International Trade Fair opened with due ceremony at the Three-Revolution Exhibition Monday.
					 Present there were Vice-premier Kang Sok Ju, Minister of Foreign Trade Ri Ryong Nam, Vice-chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee Kim Song Dok, Head of the DPRK Chamber of Commerce Ri Hak Gwon, foreign trade officials, delegations from other countries and regions, foreign diplomatic envoys and embassy officials here.
					
					 O Il Hun, vice-director of the Korean International Exhibition Corporation, made an opening speech. And So Kil Bok, vice-minister of Foreign Trade, made a congratulatory speech.
					
					 The speakers said that the fair play a positively role in expanding the economic relations among the nations as well as in joint venture, investment induction and science and technology exchanges.
					
					 The DPRK will, in the future, too, continue to boost bilateral and multilateral cooperation with other countries and regions in economic trade on the principle of equality and mutual benefits, they said.
					
					 Then the participants went round the exhibits from companies in the DPRK, China, Netherlands, Germany, Russia, Malaysia, Switzerland, Britain, Australia, Italy, France, Poland, Taipei of China and other countries and regions.
					
					 The fair will last till September 27.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Tops List of World's Flowers: Experts
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Tops List of World's Flowers: Experts
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Kimjongilia of the DPRK has become the focus of attention at the ongoing World Horticultural Expo Venlo 2012 Holland.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Ha Sin Guk, a department director of the Korea Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee.
					
					 He said:
					
					 At this expo the Committee arranged a DPRK pavilion and displayed there potted Kimilsungias and Kimjongilias with photos of top and gold prizes those immortal flowers won at the World Horticultural Expos and international flower shows.
					
					 It is the first time for the DPRK to attend the World Horticultural Expo in Europe.
					
					 The pavilion is witnessing more than 10 000 visitors each day. They have unanimously expressed great admiration at the red-colored Kimjongilia in full bloom.
					
					 The jury of the expo praised Kimjongilia as the king of flowers, the most famous flower in the world.
					
					 The chairperson of the Horticultural Association of the Netherlands, speaking at an event of 'Day of DPRK' on September 11, earnestly congratulated the DPRK delegation for its participation in the expo with the famous flowers Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia and for the fact that Kimjongilia won the first prize at the international horticultural contest in the expo.
					
					 The president of the International Association of Horticultural Producers noted at the prize-awarding ceremony that Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia won top prizes in the World Horticultural Expo held in Xi'an, China last year. Kimjongilia won the top prize again at the current expo, and this shows Kimjongilia's invariable status in the world's horticulture, the president stressed.
					
					 The expo will run until October 7.

articles.title: Kangwon Province Achieves Successes in Scientific Development
articles.content:
Kangwon Province Achieves Successes in Scientific Development
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) --The policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on stepping up the building of a thriving nation with locally available raw materials and technology and by indigenous efforts through scientific and technological development is yielding good fruits in Kangwon Province.
					 A fresh turn has been effected in the development of agriculture and stock-breeding and in the efforts to solve the issue of fuel in the last two years. 
					
					 There appeared at least 500 bases for production of hukbosan fertilizer, 18 bases for the production of amino acid microelement composite fertilizer and more than 250 bases for the production of humic acid chloride in the province in a brief span of time to greatly help rev up production and boost agricultural production.
					
					 An effective application of organic fertilizers to the co-op farms in the province helped significantly raise the fertility of overall cultivated land and boost grain production.
					
					 The growth rate of all crops in each period went up higher than the normal despite whimsical weather conditions this year. 
					
					 The province channeled great efforts into mass-producing scientifically and technologically guaranteed mineral fertilizers. 
					
					 A modern silicon potash fertilizer factory with an annual production capacity of tens of thousands of tones was built in an area of the province rich in raw materials, providing a guarantee for increasing the per-hectare grain yield. 
					
					 Stock-breeding has also made rapid progress in the province thanks to its scientific and technological achievements. 
					
					 Officials, by pooling wisdom with scientists and technicians, successfully settled technological issues arising in using large protein-rich grass which helps increase propagation rate as feed for domestic animals. 
					
					 They also succeeded in developing additives for stock-breeding by treating chicken excrement as microorganism.
					
					 At least 1,200 have appeared in the province in a short span of time to cultivate this species of grass, bringing about progress in the settlement of the issue of feed. 
					
					 The production of quality organic fertilizers by use of liquid compost from pens of domestic animals and mud from ponds helped establish a cyclic production system in agricultural production and stock-breeding. 
					
					 The province succeeded in developing additives for low caloric coal which helps increase the economic profitability last year, making a breakthrough in the solution of the issue of fuel.
					
					 It technologically updated the Chonnaeri Cement Factory and boosted the production of cement, contributing to energetically pushing forward the construction of hydro-power stations and dwelling houses and road pavement. 
					
					 The officials and scientists and technicians are intensifying the scientific researches into the projects for reenergizing economy and improving people's living standard after setting higher goals, not remaining self-complacent with their successes.

articles.title: Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Exhibition House
articles.content:
Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Exhibition House
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- An exhibition house of foodstuff and daily necessities has come into being in Janggyong-dong No. 2, Sosong District, Pyongyang.
					 The showplace puts on display foodstuffs, articles of daily use and garments made at factories under the Ministry of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Industry.
					
					 Seen on the first floor of the exhibition house are various bicycles for adults and children and several hundred kinds of foodstuffs presented by the Pyongyang Joint Venture Bicycle Factory, Sonhung Foodstuff Factory, Pyongyang Flour-Processing Factory and Pyongyang Cornstarch Factory.
					
					 On the second floor are varieties of daily necessities, school things, footwear, bags, cosmetics and household appliances manufactured by the Pyongyang Daily Necessities Factory, Pyongyang Mechanical Pencil Factory, Sinuiju Enameled Ironware Factory and other factories.
					
					 Women have deep interest in such foodstuff as instant rice and glutinous rice-cake flour, Cosmos-trademarked hairpins and Unhasu and Pomhyanggi-trademarked cosmetics.
					
					 Sonu Myong Hui, manager of the exhibition house, told KCNA:
					
					 "The exhibition house was built to help raise competitiveness among factories under the Ministry of Foodstuff and Daily Necessities Industry and timely make products suitable to the consumers' demand, as intended by leader Kim Jong Il who cared so much for the people's livelihood in his lifetime.
					
					 It also carries on commercial activities."

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Test-fire of Long-range Rocket by US Troops
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Test-fire of Long-range Rocket by US Troops
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the U.S. troops in south Korea test-fired a long-range rocket in an area near the Military Demarcation Line (MDL). 
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: 
					
					 This was a blatant challenge to the DPRK and a revelation of a criminal scenario to push the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme phase and ignite a new war at any cost.
					
					 This test-fire was something unprecedented. The danger of this saber-rattling lies in that it heralded a curtain-raiser to a preemptive strike to be made by them at the north in the area close to the MDL, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 During the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills in August the U.S. forces staged exercises for preemptive strikes at the north.
					
					 The recent rocket test-fire conducted by the U.S. forces against this backdrop indicates that they started the action to ignite the war of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 What merits more serious attention is that the second division of the U.S. forces in south Korea was involved in the test-fire because this division is the backbone of those forces.
					
					 It is the calculation of the U.S. warmongers to examine and round off the operation of the second division for a preempting attack on the DPRK by long-range rockets in the area and bring about a favorable phase for the provocation of the second Korean War. 
					
					 It is the scenario of the U.S. imperialists to ignite the war in the eyes of the north and lead it to a large-scale three-dimensional intensive strike operation against it on the ground, in the air and seas.
					
					This was the purpose of the rocket test-fire in the area along the MDL.
					
					 The DPRK is not a backyard of the U.S. The DPRK is quite different from those countries where its long-range rocket operations proved successful.
					
					 Nothing is more foolish than the U.S. bellicose forces' attempt to gain something by applying such "experience" to the DPRK.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Regime's Scenario for War against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Regime's Scenario for War against DPRK under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- Of late, there took place in Seoul a full-dress meeting of the 2nd south Korea-U.S. "combined national defense council".
					 The south Korean puppet brass hats and their American masters were closeted together over "effective proposals" for "containing the north's nukes" and cyber warfare under the pretext of someone's "threat". At the meeting the Lee group desperately implored the U.S. to mount a nuclear attack on the north.
					
					 In the meantime, the south Korean bellicose forces are mulling starting a PSI drill for apprehending and searching ships of the DPRK, etc. in the waters off Pusan from Sept. 26 with huge armed forces including Aegis warships of the U.S., Japan and other foreign forces involved.
					
					  Rodong Sinmun on Monday observes in a bylined commentary in this regard: 
					
					 This goes to prove that the Lee regime has no will to defuse the tension between the north and the south created by its provocative actions.
					
					 What the regime is now seeking is to screw up the tension in collusion with foreign forces and ignite a war of aggression against the north, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The regime's moves are dangerous provocative actions to unleash an all-out war, a nuclear war through a preemptive attack on the DPRK.
					
					 The Lee group never misses a chance to talk about someone's "threat" but this rhetoric can never mislead the public opinion.
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean regime are vicious bellicose forces disturbing peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and bringing the danger of a nuclear war to it by posing a military threat to the DPRK.
					
					 Due to the moves stepped up by the Lee regime for a war of aggression against the north, backed by foreign forces, the situation on the peninsula has reached such pass where it is beyond control, much less achieving stability.
					
					 The Lee group is sadly mistaken if it calculates it can realize its scenario for invading the north through a preemptive strike. A preemptive strike is by no means a monopoly of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime.

articles.title: S. Korean Racket for Confrontation of Social Systems under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Racket for Confrontation of Social Systems under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces' racket for escalating the confrontation of the social systems is nothing but a grave challenge to the independent and peaceful reunification of the country as it is aimed to introduce their corrupt "liberal democracy " even to the DPRK, while denying and antagonizing the ideology and social system in it.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a bylined article.
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group's move has reached the height due to its anti-DPRK "human rights" racket, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The conspiratorial ruckus kicked up by the puppet forces under the pretext of nonexistent "human rights issue in the north" is a grave politically-motivated provocation to the ideology and system in the dignified DPRK. This is aimed at realizing its sinister scenario for "achieving the unification of the social systems" by defaming the social system in the DPRK, doing  harm to its single-minded unity and, at the same time, inciting hostility toward the DPRK not only in south Korea but in the international community.
					
					 It is quite natural for distrust, confrontation and tension to fester between the north and the south as the puppet forces are desperately pursuing the moves for "unifying the social systems" while antagonizing the ideology and system in the DPRK.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations can neither be repaired nor can independent reunification be achieved as long as the above-said racket is going on in south Korea.
					
					 The confrontation of the social systems is bound to lead to a war against the north.
					
					 The puppet forces' scenario for a war for the "unification of the social systems" presupposes a preemptive attack on the DPRK. 
					
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is, indeed, the sworn enemy of the nation as it does not hesitate to ignite even a war against the DPRK in a bid to put into practice its ambition for confrontation of the social systems, quite contrary to the desire of all Koreans for independent reunification, peace and prosperity.

articles.title: Halt to Suppression of Pro-Reunification Organization Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Halt to Suppression of Pro-Reunification Organization Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea issued a statement on Sept. 20 in denunciation of the puppet authorities' suppression of an organization of the movement for peaceful reunification.
					 The statement recalled that the Intelligence Service and the police searched six places including the houses and offices of leading members of the organization in Taegu, Puchon and Kunsan.
					
					 They took this action on charges of violating the "Security Law", claiming that the organisation's call for concluding a peace agreement and the pullback of the U.S. forces from south Korea amounts to praising and encouraging the north, the statement charged, and continued:
					
					The search conducted again by the authorities against this organization in the wake of the similar operation in last February is aimed to block the brisk actions staged in different areas in protest against the naval base construction on Jeju Island and create a situation favorable for the "Saenuri Party's" stay in power.
					
					 The statement urged the IS and the police to immediately stop the suppression of the organizations of the movement for peaceful reunification including the organisation.
					
					 We will make every possible effort to get repressive mechanisms disturbing peace and blocking reunification, democracy and progress abolished and the worst draconic SL repealed, concluded the statement.

articles.title: S. Korea's Dangerous Arms Buildup under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korea's Dangerous Arms Buildup under Fire
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The south Korean warmongers are recklessly beefing up their armed forces to ignite a nuclear war on the Korean Peninsula at any cost. 
					 Some time ago, the south Korean puppet defense ministry made public "a proposal for 2030 national defense reform" the keynote of which is to implement the defence budget with priority given to bolstering up the combat capability of the south Korean army. 
					
					 The proposal called "12-30 basic plan for national defense reform" is a very dangerous scenario to completely round off the posture for igniting a war of aggression against the north. 
					
					 To this end, the south Korean military authorities plan to increase the defense spending 6-8 percent on an annual average. 
					
					 From the very beginning of his office traitor Lee Myung Bak asked his U.S. master to raise the position of south Korea in purchasing U.S. made weapons. This is an open secret. 
					
					 South Korea took the second place on the world list of weapon import in the last five years, according to a report of the International Peace Research Institute. This clearly shows how desperately the south Korean regime has pushed forward the arms buildup for igniting a war against the north. 
					
					 Not satisfied with this, the Lee Myung Bak group is getting more frantic in its moves to reinforce the war hardware for preemptive attacks on the north in the closing period of its office.

articles.title: Arirang Praised by Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
Arirang Praised by Peruvian Organization
 Pyongyang, September 24 (KCNA) -- The General Kim Jong Il Peruvian Amicable Institute issued a statement on Sept. 18 as regards the fact that the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un  watched the grand gymnastic and artistic performance "Arirang", winner of Kim Il Sung Prize, with Pyongyang citizens.
					 The statement said:
					
					 Over the last decade since it made its debut in 2002 to celebrate the 90th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung "Arirang" has made an impressive artistic representation of the past, the present and the future of the DPRK, the glorious history of Juche Korea in particular.
					
					 The extravaganza was staged more than 420 times, drawing at least 13 million people of the DPRK as well as more than 180,000 overseas Koreans, south Koreans and foreigners. This fact clearly proves its tremendous vitality and a high level of the development of culture and arts in the DPRK.
					
					 Kim Jong Un watched the performance together with Pyongyang citizens and foreign guests, greatly encouraging the service personnel and people all out in a drive to build a thriving socialist nation and the world progressives advancing along the road of independence against imperialism.
					
					 We would like to voice once again full support and solidarity with the Korean people in their just struggle for building a thriving nation and reunifying the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Il se reune con delegacion de PTT
articles.content:
Kim Yong Il se reune con delegacion de PTT
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Kim Yong Il, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, departio el dia 24 con la delegacion del Partido del Trabajo de Turquia encabezada por el miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido, Dasar Karadag, quien le hizo una visita de cortesia.

articles.title: Provocadores sufriran arruinamiento tragico, advierte CRPP
articles.content:
Provocadores sufriran arruinamiento tragico, advierte CRPP
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria hizo publica la vispera la siguiente declaracion:
					Como ya transcendidos, los titeres surcoreanos que vinieron agravando extremadamente la tension militar recurriendo con frenesi a los ejercicios belicos de caracter provocativo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en las 5 islas del Mar Oeste de Corea y su periferia, lanzaron el pasado dia 21 los buques de guerra de sus fuerzas navales a las aguas jurisdiccionales de la RPDC al suroeste de la isla Yonphyong y cometieron una grave provocacion militar tirando a ciegas las balas y proyectiles hacia los barcos civiles que se entregaban a la pesca habitual.
					
					Al mismo tiempo, armaron un alboroto fanatico movilizando con urgencia los aviones de combate armados de misiles y aumentando las fuerzas navales en la zona maritima periferica para que entraran en el estado de espera emergente.
					
					Los barcos pesqueros fijados como blancos por la banda titere fueron barcos civiles de otros paises. 
					
					Disparar a los barcos pacifistas es un crimen antietico nunca tolerable. 
					
					Los belicistas surcoreanos lo cometieron aun sabiendo que son barcos pacifistas, lo cual muestra su naturaleza barbara y bestial.
					
					Por eso, los habitantes de distintos estratos del Sur de Corea, indignados por las provocaciones militares y atrocidades de la banda titere, alzan las voces de denuncia y hasta la opinion publica interna y externa expresa una gran preocupacion por el respecto. 
					
					Indudablemente, fueron inventadas de igual manera las provocaciones militares cometidas en muchas ocasiones por los titeres surcoreanos en los alrededores de la linea de demarcacion militar y en las aguas de los mares Este y Oeste de Corea.
					
					La presente provocacion militar tan imprudente perpetrada por los titeres surcoreanos en la zona maritima de la linea divisoria militar del Mar Oeste, zona mas candente, es un complot premeditado para buscar la salida de la crisis de arruinamiento en la provocacion de guerra.
					
					Tambien deviene ultimos esfuerzos por recuperarse de la derrota y verguenza sufridas en el incidente de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong, impedir la opinion publica dirigida a las fuerzas democraticas y reformistas bajo el pretexto del problema de "seguridad" y convertir la situacion de las elecciones presidenciales en la favorable a la retoma del poder por la banda conservadora.
					
					El presente caso muestra mas claramente quien es el provocador de guerra en la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					En este mundo no existe otro bribon y maniaco de guerra como la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak que recurre a la confrontacion anti-RPDC abusando hasta de los barcos pesqueros extranjeros.
					
					La banda titere pretende provocar la guerra adhiriendose activamente a las maniobras de agresion de Estados Unidos con el fin de mantener su sucia vida restante, pero esos ultimos esfuerzos desesperados le llevan al arruinamiento. 
					
					Los militares y civiles coreanos no perdonaran jamas ninguna provocacion de los enemigos sino las frustraran  despiadadamente. 
					
					A los provocadores les tocara solo el arruinamiento y la muerte mas tragicos.

articles.title: Gran duque de Luxemburgo desea exitos en el trabajo de Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Gran duque de Luxemburgo desea exitos en el trabajo de Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ACNC) -- Hyon Hak Bong, embajador extraordinario y plenipotenciario de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en Luxemburgo, presento el dia 19 sus cartas credenciales ante Grand Duc Henri, gran duque de este pais.
					En la ocasion, el gran duque senalo que el mundo observa con gran atencion a la RPDC que tiene a Su Excelencia Mariscal Kim Jong Un como Maximo Dirigente.
					
					Formulo votos por excelentes exitos en el trabajo del Mariscal por la construccion economica del pais y el bienestar del pueblo. 
					
					Y deseo que marchen bien todos los trabajos en la RPDC. 
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se ampliaran y se desarrollaran en varios dominios.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia lanzamiento de cohete de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia lanzamiento de cohete de EE.UU.
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En un comentario individual difundido este lunes, el diario Rodong Sinmun senala que hace poco, las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea realizaron en la cercania de la linea de demarcacion militar el lanzamiento de prueba de cohete de largo alcance, lo cual es el abierto desafio a la RPDC y el criminal intento de desatar la nueva guerra empeorando la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, y  continua:
					Esto deviene el preludio del ataque preventivo contra la RPDC.
					
					En el periodo de los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Ulji Freedom Guardian" efectuados en pasado agosto, EE.UU. libro el simulacro de ataque preventivo contra la RPDC.
					
					El lanzamiento de prueba de cohete de largo alcance realizado bajo tales condiciones muestra que fue  arrancada la guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					Lo mas grave es que en este lanzamiento participo la division no.2 de las tropas norteamericanas que forma grueso principal de las tropas norteamericanas ocupantes del Sur de Corea.
					
					Las fuerzas belicistas norteamericanas calculan revisar y cumplir la operacion de ataque preventivo por los cohetes de largo alcance en la linea de demarcacion militar con las fuerzas de aquella division y abrir la fase favorable al estallido de la segunda guerra coreana.
					
					El proposito de EE.UU. es librar de esta manera la operacion de ataque tridimensional de las fuerzas armadas de gran envergadura contra la RPDC en la tierra, el mar y el aire.
					
					La RPDC no es el traspatio de EE.UU. ni  igual a los paises en que fueron logrados los "exitos de operacion" de cohetes de largo alcance de EE.UU.
					
					Sera absurdo que las fuerzas belicistas norteamericanas esperen lograr algo con la aplicacion de tales "exitos de operacion".

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia la sofisteria del premier japones
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia la sofisteria del premier japones
Pyongyang, 24 de septiembre (ACNC) -- En una reciente reunion de altos funcionarios de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa", el premier japones ordeno hacer perfectos preparativos cuestionando el "problema nuclear y de misiles" de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					Esto no pasa de ser una palabra absurda para desviar la opinion publica como si se enfrentara su pais con la amenaza militar debido a la RPDC.
					
					Asi subrayo el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 23 y continuo:
					
					Hoy dia, las maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses tendentes a convertir su pais en una potencia militar y expandir a ultramar se aceleran en una etapa peligrosa.
					
					Los belicistas de la capa militar del pais isleno tratan de ubicar adicionalmente el radar "AN/TPY-2" desarrollado por Estados Unidos con el objeto de detectar preventivamente el lanzamiento de misiles de la RPDC.
					
					Su intencion es perfeccionar el sistema antimisiles bajo el amparo de EE.UU. y asegurar su  ilimitada capacidad de ataque de agresion a Corea y otros paises asiaticos, y a la larga, tomar la supremacia militar  y  hacerse "caudillo de Asia".
					
					Los reaccionarios japoneses introdujeron ya en la ciudad de Misawa la nueva unidad de inteligencia fusionando la comandancia de la unidad de patrulla y reconocimiento de la Flota del Pacifico de EE.UU. en la ciudad de Yokohama y la otra de la primera aviacion de patrulla y reconocimiento, adscrita a la primera. Intentan construir mas en diversos puntos las bases de radar de alta fidelidad para detectar los misiles balisticas.
					
					Ellos hablan de la "amenaza" y la ampliacion de la capacidad militar de alguien, lo cual es una sofisteria para encubrir su intento criminal.
					
					El hecho comprueba que entran en la peligrosa etapa practica las maniobras de expansion a ultramar de los militaristas japoneses.
					
					Las imprudentes maniobras de Japon para la conversion de su pais en la potencia militar y la expansion a ultramar aceleraran solo su autodestruccion.
